general_advisory: General advisory: Harvest the matured paddy, control pests and diseases, manage weeds, maintain water depth in fisheries.

advisory: Right time to take up Paira crop which can be sown 15 days before harvesting of paddy.
There is a chance of powdery mildew disease in Black gram and Green gram. To control this disease, spray Sulphur 80% WP @800 g/acre or Hexaconazole 5% E.C @ 300 ml/acre.
For controlling Red Rot disease in Sugarcane, spray Carbendazim 12%+ Mancozeb 63 % WP @ 400 g /acre or Metalaxyl 8 % + Mancozeb 64 % WP @ 400 g/acre
To control downy mildew in Pointed gourd, Spray Metalaxyl 8% + Mancozeb 64% W.P @ 400 g/acre or Fosetyl-AL 80 % WP @ 600 g/acre.
